Name: Myth of Ethary
About the game: A classic RPG game with all the facets that this genre has to offer: Overworld: Starting with the starter island to the huge Ethary. Outside world: Many interesting places and dungeons await you Complete quests and fight your way through puzzles and hordes of monsters. Join Maruse in search of her father. See How You Find Your Own Destiny ...
